doc.title: On Point
doc.plot: "On Point" follows five dancers from different parts of the world and thirteen internationally renowned judges during the ups and downs at the prestigious Brasilia International Dance Seminar and Competition held in the summer of 2003. The dancers come from different personal backgrounds and circumstances - from Brasilia and the beaches of Rio De Janeiro and as far away as Australia - but each is in desperate search of an invitation or a contract from a high caliber international dance school or dance company, whether in Europe, the United States, Russia, or Australia.
